channel.title: Manuscripts on Math Life
channel.description: Recent content in Manuscripts on Math Life

item.title: Bernoulli Polynomials
item.description: These are notes on approaching Bernoulli polynomials as eigenvalues of certain operators acting on polynomials. It is my re-interpretation of work of E. H. Lehmer. I wrote this at the end of my Ph.D. studies around 1989.
